about_the_game:
Are you ready for an adventure? This add-on grants you a digital copy of a Pen & Paper One Shot (5e compatible) for you and your adventure group to experience. Pick up your sword and set out on an epic adventure with your party in this TTRPG set in the Tavern Talk world of Asteria. This One Shot has monsters, quests and so much lore on 57 pages! This comes to you as a print-ready PDF!

To access this content please do the following:
  • Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse...".
  • Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.
